title: Hyperkit Typeface Used?
content:
Hello again,

Any ideas on this lovely one designed by Hyperkit?

Cheers  
Jack

author: jackrgardiner

comments.content: it must be **[Times Modern EF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803003117/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=TimesModernEF%20-%20Regular&fid=d29390fa03ef2c828cee804cc2a678e0&fsize=60&text=TALKS&fit=1)** by Elsner+Flake
